meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being like a dog.
meanings.sent1: Her love for animals showed in her doggishness, always wagging her tail when happy.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's doggishness was evident in its playful barks and wagging tail.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's doggishness made her the perfect companion for the energetic puppy.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty and protective nature were a true display of doggishness.
meanings.sent5: The dog trainer admired the doggishness of the well-trained border collie.

meanings.definition: The behavior or mannerisms typical of a dog.
meanings.sent1: His doggishness was evident as he fetched the ball with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: The stray dog's doggishness was endearing as it wagged its tail at every passerby.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's imitation of a dog's doggishness had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her playful doggishness brightened up the room and brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The actor's portrayal of the character's doggishness was so convincing, it earned him an award.
